Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at IFA Buenaventura Hotel in San Bartolome de Tirajana (Playa del Ingles), you'll be minutes from Kasbah Shopping Center and close to Yumbo Shopping Center. This family-friendly hotel is within close proximity of Las Burras Beach and Playa de San Agustin.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 724 guestrooms. Rooms have private balconies. Wired and wireless Internet access is available (surcharge).

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Dip into one of the 2 outdoor swimming pools or enjoy other recreational amenities, which include a fitness center. Additional features include wireless Internet access (surcharge), supervised childcare/activities, and babysitting/childcare.

Dining
All-inclusive rates are available at this hotel. Meals and beverages at onsite dining establishments are included in all-inclusive rates. Charges may be applied for dining at some restaurants, special dinners and dishes, some beverages, and other amenities.

Satisfy your appetite at one of the hotel's 2 restaurants. Thirsty? Quench your thirst at one of the 2 bars/lounges or 2 poolside bars.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include high-speed (wired) Internet access (surcharge), a 24-hour front desk, and an elevator (lift). Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 7 AM
All-inclusive rates are available at this hotel. Meals and beverages at onsite dining establishments are included in all-inclusive rates. Charges may be applied for dining at some restaurants, special dinners and dishes, some beverages, and other amenities.

Satisfy your appetite at one of the hotel's 2 restaurants. Thirsty? Quench your thirst at one of the 2 bars/lounges or 2 poolside bars.


Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Dip into one of the 2 outdoor swimming pools or enjoy other recreational amenities, which include a fitness center. Additional features include wireless Internet access (surcharge), supervised childcare/activities, and babysitting/childcare.
Make yourself at home in one of the 724 guestrooms. Rooms have private balconies. Wired and wireless Internet access is available (surcharge).

With a stay at IFA Buenaventura Hotel in San Bartolome de Tirajana (Playa del Ingles), you'll be minutes from Kasbah Shopping Center and close to Yumbo Shopping Center. This family-friendly hotel is within close proximity of Las Burras Beach and Playa de San Agustin.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Kasbah Shopping Center - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Yumbo Shopping Center - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Las Burras Beach - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Playa de San Agustin - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
CITA Shopping Center - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Holiday World Maspalomas - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
Maspalomas Beach - 2.5 km / 1.5 mi
Maspalomas Golf Course - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
Maspalomas Dunes - 3.4 km / 2.1 mi
Aqualand Maspalomas - 4 km / 2.5 mi
El Aguila Beach - 4.1 km / 2.6 mi
Maspalomas Lighthouse - 4.3 km / 2.7 mi
Meloneras Beach - 4.7 km / 2.9 mi
Palmitos Park - 9.2 km / 5.7 mi
Puerto Rico Shopping Center - 14 km / 8.7 mi

The preferred airport for IFA Buenaventura Hotel is Las Palmas (LPA-Gran Canaria) - 26 km / 16.2 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
